name: Chaos Cub
text_description: Chaos Cub, still learning to harness its power, tends to harm itself when it unleashes its power. Each time it attacks, it suffers 5 HP damage.
illustration_description: A small, mischievous creature with a shock of spiky hair stands uncertainly on a chaotic landscape. Its eyes, full of mirth, glow a bright red. Crackles of chaotic energy dance around its tiny body.
